attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:

THE ANTI-BULLYING-

I will send more detail, i will send more detail, explaining the act- how it going to work, and what it involves. I am willing to send my detailed plan to prime minister, if my campain is expexted, and if prime minister is happy to read my detaild plan.
